concept.title: Throttle control
concept.shortdesc: The throttle regulates the mixture of fuel and air being burned by the engine. Increase the throttle to increase the speed or power of the engine..

conbody.p: The throttle control is operated by the first ¼ in (6.35mm) of movement of the choke. FB: link here to choke.
This initial movement can be used to give a fast engine idling speed and prevent stalling when driving at low speeds before the engine has fully warmed up.
Using the throttle control in this way is not detrimental to the engine.
